alert.note: Alert for Newberry; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 06 at 5:14AM EST until January 07 at 8:05PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Calhoun and Richland Counties. Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Calhoun, Lexington and Richland Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Saluda River At Chappells affecting Greenwood, Newberry and Saluda Counties. Enoree River At Whitmire affecting Newberry and Union Counties. Congaree River At Columbia affecting Lexington and Richland Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Enoree River At Whitmire. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, River bottomland near and downstream from Whitmire become flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 AM EST Friday the stage was 25.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:30 AM EST Friday was 26.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.9 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Report any flooding directly to the Columbia National Weather Service at 803 234 4115 when it is safe to do so. You can also send reports by Facebook or Twitter to NWSColumbia or by e-mail at NWS.Columbia@noaa.gov. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and take action if necessary. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 515 PM EST.
